yulup-0.2.7-r24052.xpi (md5) (April 27, 2007)
Changelog:
Escape characters in URIs in WYSIWYG documents correctly.
New and improved editing widgets.
Improved editing performance.
Improved image/asset upload.
Improved link selection.
Improved handling of relative URIs.
Neutron 2 implemented.
Implemented workflow and versioning functionality in Neutron sidebar.
Lots of under-the-hood changes and bug-fixing.
